00019 /**
00020  * @defgroup ApnsPHP_Push Push
00021  * @ingroup ApplePushNotificationService
00022  */
00023 
00024 /**
00025  * The Push Notification Provider.
00026  * 
00027  * The class manages a message queue and sends notifications payload to Apple Push
00028  * Notification Service.
00029  * 
00030  * @ingroup ApnsPHP_Push
00031  */ 
00032 class ApnsPHP_Push extends ApnsPHP_Abstract
00033 {
00034     const COMMAND_PUSH = 0; /**< @type integer Payload command. */
00035     
00036     protected $_nSendRetryTimes = 3; /**< @type integer Send retry times. */
00037     
00038     protected $_aServiceURLs = array(
00039         'ssl://gateway.push.apple.com:2195', // Production environment
00040         'ssl://gateway.sandbox.push.apple.com:2195' // Sandbox environment
00041     ); /**< @type string Service URLs environments. */
00042 
00043     protected $_aMessageQueue = array(); /**< @type array Message queue. */
00044 
00045     /**
00046      * Constructor.
00047      *
00048      * @param  $nEnvironment @type integer Environment.
00049      * @param  $sProviderCertificateFile @type string Provider certificate file
00050      *         with key (Bundled PEM).
00051      */
00052     public function __construct($nEnvironment, $sProviderCertificateFile)
00053     {
00054         parent::__construct($nEnvironment, $sProviderCertificateFile);
00055         $this->_nSendRetryTimes = self::SEND_RETRY_TIMES;
00056     }
00057 
00058     /**
00059      * Set the send retry times value.
00060      * 
00061      * If the client is unable to send a payload to to the server retries at least
00062      * for this value. The default send retry times is 3.
00063      *
00064      * @param  $nRetryTimes @type integer Send retry times.
00065      */
00066     public function setSendRetryTimes($nRetryTimes)
00067     {
00068         $this->_nSendRetryTimes = (int)$nRetryTimes;
00069     }
00070 
00071     /**
00072      * Get the send retry time value.
00073      *
00074      * @return @type integer Send retry times.
00075      */
00076     public function getSendRetryTimes()
00077     {
00078         return $this->_nSendRetryTimes;
00079     }
00080 
00081     /**
00082      * Adds a message to the message queue.
00083      *
00084      * @param  $message @type ApnsPHP_Message The message.
00085      */
00086     public function add(ApnsPHP_Message $message)
00087     {
00088         $sMessagePayload = (string)$message;
00089         $nRecipients = $message->getRecipientsNumber();
00090         
00091         for ($i = 0; $i < $nRecipients; $i++) { 
00092             $this->_aMessageQueue[] = array(
00093                 'MESSAGE' => $message,
00094                 'BINARY_NOTIFICATION' => $this->_getBinaryNotification(
00095                     $message->getRecipient($i),
00096                     $sMessagePayload
00097                 ),
00098                 'RETRY_TIMES' => 0
00099             );
00100         }
00101     }
00102 
00103     /**
00104      * Sends all messages in the message queue to Apple Push Notification Service.
00105      *
00106      * @throws ApnsPHP_Push_Exception if not connected to the
00107      *         service or no notification queued.
00108      */
00109     public function send()
00110     {
00111         if (!$this->_hSocket) {
00112             throw new ApnsPHP_Push_Exception(
00113                 'Not connected to Push Notification Service'
00114             );
00115         }
00116 
00117         if (empty($this->_aMessageQueue)) {
00118             throw new ApnsPHP_Push_Exception(
00119                 'No notifications queued to be sent'
00120             );
00121         }
00122 
00123         foreach($this->_aMessageQueue as $k => &$aMessage) {
00124             $bSuccessfulSent = false;
00125             while ($bSuccessfulSent == false && $aMessage['RETRY_TIMES'] <= $this->_nSendRetryTimes) {
00126                 pcntl_signal_dispatch();
00127                 if ($aMessage['RETRY_TIMES'] > 0) {
00128                     $this->_log(
00129                         'INFO: Retrying to send message ' . ($k+1) . " (" .
00130                         "{$aMessage['RETRY_TIMES']}/" . $this->_nSendRetryTimes . ')...'
00131                     );
00132                 }
00133                 
00134                 $aMessage['RETRY_TIMES']++;
00135                 
00136                 $nLen = strlen($aMessage['BINARY_NOTIFICATION']);
00137                 if ($nLen !== ($nWritten = (int)@fwrite($this->_hSocket, $aMessage['BINARY_NOTIFICATION']))) {
00138                     $this->_log("ERROR: Unable to send message. Written {$nWritten} bytes instead of {$nLen} bytes");
00139                     continue;
00140                 }
00141 
00142                 $bSuccessfulSent = true;
00143 
00144                 $read = array($this->_hSocket);
00145                 $null = NULL;
00146                 $nChangedStreams = @stream_select($read, $null, $null, 0, $this->_nSocketSelectTimeout);
00147                 if ($nChangedStreams === false) {
00148                     $this->_log('WARNING: Unable to wait for a stream availability.');
00149                 } else if ($nChangedStreams > 0) {
00150                     if (feof($this->_hSocket)) {
00151                         $bSuccessfulSent = false;
00152                         $this->_log('ERROR: Unable to send message ' . ($k+1) . ', stream could be no more connected.');
00153                         $this->disconnect();
00154                         $this->connect();
00155                     }
00156                 }
00157             }
00158 
00159             if ($bSuccessfulSent) {
00160                 $this->_log('INFO: Message ' . ($k+1) . ' sent.');
00161                 unset($this->_aMessageQueue[$k]);
00162             }
00163         }
00164     }
00165 
00166     /**
00167      * Returns all messages in the message queue.
00168      * 
00169      * When a message is successful sent is removed from the message queue.
00170      * Getting the message queue after a send operation is useful to know which
00171      * messages are not delivered to the end user.
00172      *
00173      * @param  $bEmpty @type boolean @optional Empty message queue.
00174      * @return @type array Array of messages left on the queue.
00175      */
00176     public function getQueue($bEmpty = true)
00177     {
00178         $aRet = $this->_aMessageQueue;
00179         if ($bEmpty) {
00180             $this->_aMessageQueue = array();
00181         }
00182         return $aRet;
00183     }
00184 
00185     /**
00186      * Generate a binary notification from a device token and a JSON-encoded payload.
00187      * 
00188      * @see http://tinyurl.com/ApplePushNotificationBinary
00189      *
00190      * @param  $sDeviceToken @type string The device token.
00191      * @param  $sPayload @type string The JSON-encoded payload.
00192      * @return @type string A binary notification.
00193      */
00194     protected function _getBinaryNotification($sDeviceToken, $sPayload)
00195     {
00196         $nTokenLength = strlen($sDeviceToken);
00197         $nPayloadLength = strlen($sPayload);
00198 
00199         $sRet  = pack('CnH*', self::COMMAND_PUSH, self::DEVICE_BINARY_SIZE, $sDeviceToken);
00200         $sRet .= pack('n', $nPayloadLength);
00201         $sRet .= $sPayload;
00202         
00203         return $sRet;
00204     }
00205 }
